biotools.summary: Web tool to search and design primers for genotyping based on genomic data. The tool identifies and targets Single Sequence Repeat (SSR) or ortholog sequences for large-scale identification and design of taxon-specific primers.

bioschemas.name: TipMT
bioschemas.summary: Web tool to search and design primers for genotyping based on genomic data. The tool identifies and targets Single Sequence Repeat (SSR) or ortholog sequences for large-scale identification and design of taxon-specific primers.
